attributes.action: pull out of wars that do not concern us.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We used to be a country with great defence. As a country we need to sort problems that are here not a thousand miles away. build our defences back up and sort this country out. 
       BRING OUR TROOPS BACK!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
